title: Uncle Wiggly's Storybook
description: Howard R. Garris s stories of the kindhearted, resourceful rabbit gentleman, Uncle Wiggly Longears, have been an irresistible source of joy for generations of readers. These charming modern classics offer gentle lessons amid laughter as the clever, courteous rabbit ingeniously helps his animal and human friends. Format: 7 tracks, Audio CDPublisher: Greathall ProductionsNarrator: Jim WeissISBN: 1882513800
author: Howard Roger Garis
